bibl.title: Columbia Papyri IX. The Vestis Militaris Codex. (American Studies in Papyrology. 39.)
bibl.note: 4 tabl., 1 diagramme, 5 figg., 1 carte et 12 pll.

Diss. Columbia Univ., 1990. - P. Col. IX, 247-248. - Part I: Nos 247. Account of the Vestis Militaris; - 248. Private Account. - Part II: Commentary: 1. The Vestis Militaris and the Uniform of the Roman Army; - 2. Clothing Deductions and Acquisition through the End of the Third Century; - 3. The Fourth Century and the Vestis Militaris; - 4. The Administration of the Hermopolite Nome. - Part III: Appendices: 1. Catalogue of Clothing Requisition Documents; - 2. Catalogue of Toponyms. - Bibliography. Index.
